hero.title: Hello
hero.description: It's iGeek - a software development company focused on building scalable, reliable, and innovative digital solutions. We work with startups, growing businesses, and enterprises to transform ideas into impactful products through smart design and strong engineering.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description:
Project overview

  • Built a modern, visually engaging digital solution aimed at improving user interaction and accessibility.
  • The project involved end-to-end development, from initial design concepts to final deployment.
  • Focused on delivering an intuitive user experience and seamless technical performance.

Problem statement

  • Users faced friction navigating legacy systems or outdated interfaces, leading to drop-offs and low conversion.
  • The client needed a responsive, scalable, and engaging platform that would align with their brand and business goals.
  • Design and development needed to accommodate multiple screen sizes and maintain performance at scale.

Our role

  • UI/UX Design – wireframes, mockups, and high-fidelity visuals created in Figma.
  • Frontend Development – built using a component-driven architecture for better reusability.
  • Backend Development – structured for scalability with REST APIs and clean business logic.
